urls.title: Hydrometry: River Discharge Monitoring using ADCPs
urls.description: Acoustic Doppler Current Profilers (ADCPs) offer a well-proven and highly effective method for River Discharge Monitoring. ADCPs can help you to obtain accurate discharge measurements in a variety of sites ranging from small streams to the largest of rivers. Feedback for a bespoke course for the Office for Public Works in May 2021 was 99% positive! Location and Date: Online! (a classroom-based  course with a fieldwork element may be on offer from spring 2022) 21- 24 September 2021 - 4 half days ( 9:30 – 1 pm) Please book online here now (credit and debit cards accepted) Cost: Students: £449 Professionals £499 Booking closes on 17 September 2021. Short Course Description: This very practical training workshop is for new starters and moderately experienced ADCP users alike. We will provide a live interactive learning experience via Zoom with virtual breakout rooms. We will also provide recorded videos demonstrating several of the field techniques. These will show deployment of equipment
